item.name: CMOS Battery Status
item.description: This attribute defines the status of the battery.

item.name: Overall System LCD Status
item.description: This attribute defines the system status as it is reflected by the LCD front panel. Not all system components may be included.

item.name: Overall System Rollup Status
item.description: This attribute defines the overall rollup status of all components in the system being monitored by theremote access card. Includes system, storage, IO devices, iDRAC, CPU, memory, etc.

item.name: Overall System Storage Status
item.description: This attribute defines the overall storage status being monitored by the remote access card.

item.name: DRAC Access URL
item.description: This attribute defines the out-of-band UI URL of a remote access card.

item.name: System Asset Tag
item.description: This attribute defines the service tag of the system.

item.name: System Express Service Code
item.description: This attribute defines the express service code of the system.

item.name: DRAC Firmware version
item.description: This attribute defines the firmware version of a remote access card.

item.name: DRAC version
item.description: This attribute defines the short product name of a remote access card.

item.name: Power Usage Minimum Idle Power
item.description: This attribute defines the system idle power (in Watts). This is the minimum power the system can consume based on the current hardware configuration.

item.name: RAID Controller : Name
item.description: The controller's name as represented in Storage Management.

item.name: RAID Controller : Status
item.description: Severity of the controller state. This is the combined status of the controller and its components.

item.name: System BIOS Status
item.description: This attribute defines the status of the system BIOS.

item.name: System Model Name
item.description: This attribute defines the model name of the system.

item.name: Voltage Status Combined
item.description: This attribute defines the combined status of all voltage probes of this system.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Manufacture Day
item_prototype.description: The day of the week (1=Sunday thru 7=Saturday) on which the physical disk was manufactured.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Manufacturer
item_prototype.description: The name of the physical disk's manufacturer.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Manufacture Week
item_prototype.description: The week (1 thru 53) in which the physical disk was manufactured.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Manufacture Year
item_prototype.description: The four digit year in which the physical disk was manufactured.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Model Number
item_prototype.description: The model number of the physical disk.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Name
item_prototype.description: The physical disk's name as represented in Storage Management.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Serial Number
item_prototype.description: The physical disk's unique identification number from the manufacturer.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Disk Size
item_prototype.description: The size of the physical disk in megabytes.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Disk State
item_prototype.description: The current state of this physical disk. Possible states: 1:The current state could not be determined. 2:The physical disk is available for use, but no RAID configuration has been assigned. 3:A RAID configuration has been assigned to the physical disk. 4:The physical disk has been moved from another controller and contains all or some portion of a virtual disk. 5:The physical disk is not available to the RAID controller. 6:The physical disk is currently blocked by controller. 7:The physical disk is not operational. 8:The physical disk is not a RAID capable disk 9:The physical disk has been removed.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} : Disk Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the physical disk itself without the propagation of any contained component status. Possible values: 1:Other 2:Unknown 3:OK 4:Non-critical 5:Critical 6:Non-recoverable

item_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPVALUE} Speed
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the reading for a cooling device of subtype other than coolingDeviceSubTypeIsDiscrete. When the value for coolingDeviceSubType is other than coolingDeviceSubTypeIsDiscrete, the value returned for this attribute is the speed in RPM or the OFF/ON value of the cooling device. When the value for coolingDeviceSubType is coolingDeviceSubTypeIsDiscrete, a value is not returned for this attribute.

item_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPVALUE} Status
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the probe status of the cooling device.

item_prototype.name: Memory Slot {#SNMPVALUE} Manufacturer
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the manufacturer of the memory device.

item_prototype.name: Memory Slot {#SNMPVALUE} Part Number
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the manufacturer's part number for the memory device.

item_prototype.name: Memory Slot {#SNMPVALUE} Serial Number
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the serial number of the memory device.

item_prototype.name: Memory Slot {#SNMPVALUE} Size
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the size in KBytes of the memory device. Zero indicates no memory installed;2,147,483,647 indicates an unknown memory size.

item_prototype.name: Memory Slot {#SNMPVALUE} Speed
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the speed in nanoseconds of the memory device. Zero indicates an unknown speed.

item_prototype.name: Memory Slot {#SNMPVALUE} Status
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the status of the memory device.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} : Connection Status
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the connection status of the network device.

valuemap.name: Dell iDRAC Network Device Connection Status

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} : MAC Address
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the current MAC address of the network device.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} : Name
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the product name of the network device.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} : Status
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the status of the network device.

item_prototype.name: Power Supply {#SNMPINDEX} Input Voltage
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the input voltage to the power supply (in Volts).

item_prototype.name: Power Supply {#SNMPINDEX} Maximum Power
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the maximum sustained output wattage of the power supply (in tenths of Watts).

item_prototype.name: Power Supply {#SNMPINDEX} Sensor State
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the state reported by the power supply sensor. This attribute supplements the attribute powerSupplyStateSettingsUnique.

item_prototype.name: Power Supply {#SNMPINDEX} State Settings
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the state settings of the power supply.

item_prototype.name: Power Supply {#SNMPINDEX} Status
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the status of the power supply.

item_prototype.name: Processor {#SNMPVALUE} Brand Name
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the brand of the processor device.

item_prototype.name: Processor {#SNMPVALUE} Cores Num
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the number of processor cores enabled for the processor device.

item_prototype.name: Processor {#SNMPVALUE} Current Speed
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the current speed of the processor device in MHz. Zero indicates the current speed is unknown.

item_prototype.name: Processor {#SNMPVALUE} Status
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the status of the processor device.

item_prototype.name: Processor {#SNMPVALUE} Thread Count
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the number of processor threads detected for the processor device.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3 and {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>2) or ({Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(86400)}<>2 and {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}=2)
trigger_prototype.name: Error on Processor {#SNMPVALUE}

item_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#SNMPVALUE} Critical Low-Limit
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the lower critical threshold of the temperature probe. The value is an integer representing the temperature of the threshold in tenths of degrees Centigrade.

item_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#SNMPVALUE} Critical Up-Limit
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the upper critical threshold of the temperature probe. The value is an integer representing the temperature of the threshold in tenths of degrees Centigrade.

item_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#SNMPVALUE} Status
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the probe status of the temperature probe.

item_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#SNMPVALUE} Warning Low-Limit
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the lower noncritical threshold of the temperature probe. The value is an integer representing the temperature of the threshold in tenths of degrees Centigrade.

item_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#SNMPVALUE} Warning Up-Limit
item_prototype.description: This attribute defines the upper noncritical threshold of the temperature probe. The value is an integer representing the temperature of the threshold in tenths of degrees Centigrade.

trigger_prototype.name: Temperature on {#SNMPVALUE} critically high
trigger_prototype.description: Temperature of the item is above Critical Level.

trigger_prototype.name: Temperature on {#SNMPVALUE} critically low
trigger_prototype.description: Temperature of the item is below Critical Level.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:TempValue.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} > {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:TempWarnUpLimit.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} and {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:TempValue.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} < {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:TempCritUpLimit.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature on {#SNMPVALUE} to high
trigger_prototype.description: Temperature of the item is above Warning Level.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:TempValue.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} < {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:TempWarnLowLimit.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} and {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:TempValue.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} > {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:TempCritLowLimit.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature on {#SNMPVALUE} to low
trigger_prototype.description: Temperature of the item is below Warning Level.

item_prototype.name: Volume {#SNMPINDEX} : Virtual Disk State
item_prototype.description: The current state of this virtual disk(which includes any member physical disks.) Possible states: 1:The current state could not be determined. 2:The virtual disk is operating normally or optimally. 3:The virtual disk has encountered a failure. The data on disk is lost or is about to be lost. 4:The virtual disk encounterd a failure with one or all of the constituent redundant physical disks. The data on the virtual disk might no longer be fault tolerant.

item_prototype.name: Volume {#SNMPINDEX} : Name
item_prototype.description: The virtual disk's friendly FQDD as represented in Storage Management.

item_prototype.name: Volume {#SNMPINDEX} : Size
item_prototype.description: The size of the virtual disk in megabytes.

item_prototype.name: Volume {#SNMPINDEX} : State
item_prototype.description: The virtual disk's RAID type. Possible values: 1:Not one of the following 2:RAID-0 3:RAID-1 4:RAID-5 5:RAID-6 6:RAID-10 7:RAID-50 8:RAID-60 9:Concatenated RAID 1 10:Concatenated RAID 5

item_prototype.name: Volume {#SNMPINDEX} : Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the virtual disk itself without the propagation of any contained component status. Possible values: 1:Other. 2:Unknown. 3:OK. 4:Non-critical . 5:Critical. 6:Non-recoverable.

trigger.expression: {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:GlobalSystemPowerState.last(0)}<>4 and {Template Dell iDrac SNMPV2:GlobalSystemPowerState.last(0)}<>0
trigger.name: System is not online

value_map.name: Dell iDRAC Network Device Connection Status

mapping.newvalue: AC lost or out of range
AC out of range but still present
